metadata.name: Link
metadata.description:
I've always loved new technologies, as I'm an inquisitive person that loves new things and everything unknown, and because of that, crypto has been a super interesting piece of technology that I've been able to be a part of last year. There are various concerns about its environmental impact, and while I think that (as well as many things around us) it's true that there's some impact, I believe that nature will always win. Link is a piece that speaks just about that, and about how both technology and nature can coexist together.

Unique piece exhibited at 0xSociety's MetaVRse from February 24th until April 24th, 2022.

More info here:
https://0x-society.medium.com/editorial-metavrse-preservation-in-the-digital-age-4653be2a13cc

5000x6250px
Santiago, Chile.
